title: HOSTEL VS PG
content:
Im gonna join PES EC campus this year. I wanna know which one's better, hostel or PG. I know the situation for first year. I want to enjoy my time after college gets over by 4 or smtg. I wanna play sports or just hang out with friends or if required study together with friends . But the buses from college end at 4or5. Ill try to get a cycle or bike, but i saw in the FAQ section that cycles r not allowed. is that true??

 I saw that the curfew is 7 or 7:30, which seems riddiculus. I saw the sports facilities and gym open still 7 in the college. So if I get done with that at 7, how am i supposed to report back to hostel?? How strict is this curfew. Like if i am doing something genuiene in college itselft like playing badminton in MRD or going to gym in mrd, will i be allowed to do that till 7 and be allowed back in the hostel?? 

**IM ASKING THIS FOR THE FIRST YEAR HOSTEL WHICH IS 7km AWAY**

Also I like to have a bit freedom and i like my privacy beeing respected, which seems hard to find if i go to hostel.

So is it worth the cost for me to be in the hostel or should i get a PG. Please suggest what i shld do.

comments.body: For your situation, Pg will be the best option for you. Pg in total for the whole year won't cost much more than the hostel also. Most of friends shifted to pg after 1st year
